title: Traits and Features
content: Feature Summon forth a creature of darkness. Shadow Magic Lv 6 Strength of the Grave Feature If you reach 0 hit points, you regain 1 instead of becoming Downed. Shadow Magic Fancy Footwork Feature If you make a melee attack against a target, that target can't make opportunity attacks against you for the rest of your turn.
